keywords.value: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Charleston, SC)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The money was donated to Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church after the racially motivated killings there last June.

headline.print_headline: Charleston Church Distributes $1.5 Million to the Families of Nine Who Were Killed
headline.main: Charleston Church Distributes $1.5 Million to Families of Victims

snippet: The money was donated to Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church after the racially motivated killings there last June.
abstract: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church in Charleston, SC, where nine African Americans were fatally shot by allegedly racist gunman, gives $1.5 million in donations to victims' families; some relatives express frustration that church kept $1.8 million for its own purposes.
